Articles.Content:
That's right, we're enabled RSS feeds on the forums. You can now keep track of your favorite forums using an RSS reader.

I'm going to put together a custom feed that will contain all the developers posts, articles, and blog entries in one feed to make it easier to keep track of the really important news. I'll add it to this post when it's ready.

New Posts RSS Feed: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/external.php?lastpost=true&type=rss2

(It's the same list you get when clicking the New Posts link)

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Edited May 4, 2013 by Capt'n Skunky
